title: Need ADC for Team
body:
Looking for competitive chill adc who will listen to call outs and be the voice of bot lane. Please do not spam me with friend request rather just post here filling out application.

Age:
Champion pool:
Strengths:
Weaknesses:
Time zone and available times to play:

replies.body:
Age: 22 
Champion pool: vayne cait draven
Strengths: carry potential
Weaknesses: not getting support that know their limits
Time zone and available times to play: est and after 8pm

19 
that's alot to put I play a lot champs most midlaners I dont play annie, cass, vlad, and ryze or all assasins besides kass
I play alot 
I'm not funny 
central time mon-friday 4-9 will need 30 min to eat and will play later if games go by sat-sun I can play 12 hours a day

Age: 19
Champion pool: All adc besides kalista
Strengths: Able to take critism, talk a lot, open
Weaknesses: Map awareness, overaggressive 
Time zone and available times to play: EST, weekdays after 6, weekends free except one Saturday a month(army reserve)

i'm 19, I can play xayah, vayne, ashe, caitlyn, tristana, jhin, jinx, lucian, trying to learn others too. strengths: I can play a lot, I always look to improve and can take critasism without being salty, I dont argue, I am fine not being the star player, I can adjust game to game, I love the game. weakneses: I can be slightly annebriated during later sat and friday night but can change if u plan some be4 scrims, etc. I don't think i'm a great shotcaller, I can't think of any other real weaknesses. timezone: central time zone I can play mon-friday 4-9 will need sometime to eat and can play up to 2 hours later if games go long sat-sun I can play up to 12 hours maybe more but 8 hours will be to sleep.

Age: 21
Champion pool: Almost every Adc
Strengths: positioning and communication 
Weaknesses: over aggressive at times 
Time zone and available times to play: Est and anytime in the afternoon most days

Age: 17
Champion pool: cait trist ashe kog kali

Strengths: aggressive

Weaknesses:can get caught out 

Time zone and available times to play: est  after 3pm during the week all day on weekends
